description.en: Magic Stone that adds 20% Electric Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Electric Element.
description.ar: Magic Stone that adds 20% Electric Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Electric Element.
description.br: Pedra Mágica que acrescenta 20% de Ataque Elétrico. A arma deve ter o Elemento de Eletricidade.
description.cns: 提升武器20%雷属性攻击力的魔法石。武器必须有雷属性。
description.de: Magischer Stein, der den Elektroangriff deiner Waffe um 20% erhöht. Die Waffe muss das Elektroelement besitzen.
description.fi: Magic Stone that adds 20% Electric Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Electric Element.
description.fil: Magic Stone that adds 20% Electric Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Electric Element.
description.fr: Pierre Divine ajoutant à votre arme 20% d'attaque de Foudre. Votre arme doit avoir un élément de Foudre.
description.id: Magic Stone yang menambahkan 20% Serangan Listrik ke Senjatamu. Senjata harus memiliki Elemen Listrik.
description.it: Magic Stone that adds 20% Electric Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Electric Element.
description.jp: 雷属性攻撃力を20％強化するマジックストーン。武器には「雷」の属性が必要です。
description.kr: 전기 속성 공격력을 20% 상승시키는 마법의 돌. 무기는 반드시 전기 속성이 있어야 한다.
description.nl: Magic Stone that adds 20% Electric Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Electric Element.
description.pl: Magic Stone that adds 20% Electric Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Electric Element.
description.ru: Magic Stone that adds 20% Electric Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Electric Element.
description.sp: Piedra Mágica que otorga Daño de Electricidad +20% a tu Arma. El Arma debe tener Elemento de Electricidad.
description.sw: Magic Stone that adds 20% Electric Attack to your Weapon. The Weapon must have Electric Element.
description.th: หินวิเศษที่เพิ่มElectric Attack 20% ให้กับอาวุธของคุณ อาวุธต้องมีธาตุไฟฟ้า
description.tw: 為武器增加20%雷屬性攻擊的魔法石。 武器須有雷屬性。
description.vi: Đá ma thuật tăng thêm 20% Tấn công điện cho Vũ khí của bạn. Vũ khí phải có Nguyên tố điện.
